scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Shanon
scrape.text: I am quite upset I wasted my time on this novel. the only reason it gets two stars is that the grammar was flawless and that pleased me.This is how I see it: 2 teenaged white boys beat and kill homeless people-they are just making stupid "innocent" mistakes, no need to justifiably punish them. Their adopted African son, who urges them against the MURDER, blackmail the boys for a pretty small amount considering, he's up to no good, his aunt arranges for him to be silenced by any means necessary. And somehow blames the homeless woman for seeking warm shelter in an ATM enclave.I do not recommend this book. Seriously, I was stoked to see it in my library's digital reserve because I picked up a physical copy in Barnes & Nobel and thought about buying it. I'm glad I just wasted my time and not my dollars.
